intro:
Immerse yourself in the breathtaking world of "Helichapter X" and get ready to take flight and deliver the goods in this exhilarating adventure.
Take control of a sleek and powerful helicopter as you navigate through a stunning city and thrilling missions.
Your objective is clear: deliver precious gifts to designated targets within the given time frame.
It's a race against the clock as you skillfully maneuver your helicopter, aiming with precision to hit your marks.
But beware - the skies are not without their challenges. 
Navigate through dynamic environments, avoiding obstacles and hazards that stand in your way.
It's a test of your piloting skills as you push the limits of aerial precision.
With no combat to distract you, "Helichapter X" focuses solely on the thrill of aerial delivery missions.
